terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.agreement: By using this website you are bound to these terms.
terms.services: Sammy Parks allows drivers to register vehicles and pay for permits and tickets.
terms.fees: All decisions made by parking enforcement and administration regarding fees and payments are final. We do not offer refunds for parking permits.
terms.accounts: To access many of our services you may be required to make an account.
conduct: Use ParkClear for fraudulent or unlawful purposes.
Attempt to reverse engineer or interfere with the operation of the Service.
Impersonate any other person or entity.
terms.liability: To the maximum extent permitted by law, ParkClear Inc. shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, including missed payment deadlines, additional fines, or legal actions, even if advised of the possibility.
